document.discussion_title: Joyce Carol Thomas, award-winning children’s author, dies at 78
document.topic_text: Photo: Mike Kepka / The Chronicle 2004. Joyce Carol Thomas won the National Book Award for “Marked by Fire” (1983). Joyce Carol Thomas won the National Book Award for “Marked by... Joyce Carol Thomas, a prolific and prize-winning children’s author whose books centered on African American life and tackled racial inequality, has died. She was 78.
